confirmReload.message: This extension requires you to reload tabs after install. Could you reload the current tab now?

welcomeMessage.message: Welcome! Please open a page in a new tab, and click the Gyazo button!

contextMenuSettingLabel.message: Always show Gyazo in context menu

pasteSupportSettingLabel.message: Replace Gyazo's URL to markdown style when it's pasted on github.com.

copyUrlSupportSettingLabel.message: Copy uploded Gyazo URL to clipboard after success

fileSizeLimitHelpText.message: Files larger than this size will be compressed

pageScrollDelayHelpText.message: Please set slow if images are broken

selectTeamToLogin.message: Select team to upload on extension's option page

loginToTeamsLink.message: You can switch other team by signup to the team
